summary: A New Orleans musician has a nightmare about killing a man in a strange house but he suspects that it really happened.
cast: Edward G. Robinson|Kevin McCarthy|Connie Russell|Virginia Christine|Rhys Williams|Gage Clarke|Marian Carr|Barry Atwater|Meade 'Lux' Lewis|Billy May and His Orchestra|Ralph Brooks|Jack Chefe|Sol Gorss|John Mitchum|Cosmo Sardo
keywords: psychotronic film|nightmare|new orleans louisiana|falling from height|stabbing
title: Noche de pesadilla
